ygData.subject: Barbed Leather Whip Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all, I have a Dragoon Dirk and have boosted my piercing to around 60 (out of 80). I find that I still like the secure feeling of my heavy, slow mino
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all,

I have a Dragoon Dirk and have boosted my piercing to around 60 (out of 80). I find that I still like the secure feeling of my heavy, slow mino axe for big stuff. I'm planning to put the dirk in my off hand when I hit 17 and want something magical for the primary. The barbed leather whip seems to have good stats.

Questions:

1) How much should I auction for it and where? (I know it comes out of Najena)

2) Is it better bang for the buck than a combine ls or scim?

3) Do I have a chance at skipping it and camping for a PGT before 20?

Thanks!

Operaman

Meandering Maestro of the 15th Song

Innoruuk
